october  

Police are currently in the process of identifying two men who robbed the Mattoon Holiday Inn Express at  p.m PERIOD Sunday PERIOD



The victim was able to identify the men as being two white males PERIOD One male was said to be  to  muscular build the other was described as  to  slender and blue eyes PERIOD

The taller one was also described as having a prominent nose PERIOD

The two men entered the hotel wearing ski masks and were armed with guns PERIOD

They demanded money from the register located at the front desk PERIOD The amount taken is still undetermined PERIOD

Jason Taylor the Mattoon Police Department Deputy Chief said the department is working on follow ups of several leads PERIOD

Taylor asks that if anyone was in the area and saw a car speeding away from the hotel or may know someone who would commit this crime that they report their information immediately PERIOD

Mattoon Police are asking anyone with information about the armed robbery to contact the Mattoon Police Department at  or Crime Stoppers at  PERIOD
